scripts.build: npm run configure && npx esbuild --log-level=silent --format=esm --platform=node --target=node21.7 --bundle --packages=external --outfile=./build/buildGsheetsAddon.js ./scripts/gsheets-addon/build.mts && BASE_DIR=. ENVIRONMENT=PRODUCTION node ./build/buildGsheetsAddon.js
scripts.dev: npm run configure && npx esbuild --log-level=silent --format=esm --platform=node --target=node21.7 --bundle --packages=external --outfile=./build/buildGsheetsAddon.js ./scripts/gsheets-addon/build.mts && BASE_DIR=. ENVIRONMENT=DEVELOPMENT node ./build/buildGsheetsAddon.js
scripts.website: npm run configure && npx esbuild --log-level=silent --format=esm --platform=node --target=node21.7 --bundle --packages=external --outfile=./build/buildWebsite.js ./scripts/website/build.mts && BASE_DIR=. node ./build/buildWebsite.js
